doc.after: A medical school is a tertiary educational institution or part of such an institution that teaches medicine and awards a professional degree for physicians and surgeons Such degrees include the Doctor of Medicine MD Bachelor of Medicine Bachelor of Surgery BMBS MBBS MBChB or Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine DO Many medical schools offer additional degrees such as a Doctor of Philosophy Master s degree a physician assistant program or other post secondary education
